name: data-gateway-service
description: Provides a GraphQL API for the entirey system by acting as a microservices data access layer

scripts.cf:deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file build/infrastructure.packaged.yaml --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --stack-name [PROJECT_NAME]-data-gateway-service-dev-stack --parameter-overrides Environment=development
scripts.build: npm i && mkdir -p build && npm run cf:package
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run cf:deploy
